description:
As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca`s history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!
Fujitora Ugoku: Mugiwara no Ichimi Kanzen Houimou
Fujitora avance. Le siège parfait des Mugiwara
Fujitoras nächster Schritt – Die vollständige Belagerung der Strohhüte
Фуджитора начинает действовать! Мугивары полностью окружены
يبدأ فوجيتورا التّحرّك! محاصرة طاقم قبّعة القشّ الكاملة!
藤虎動く 麦わらの一味完全包囲網
